entry.tran: 柏柏尔人的；柏柏尔语的
entry.def: Berber means belonging or relating to a particular Muslim people in North Africa, or to their language or customs.

example.ex: A Berber rug makes a colourful wall-hanging.
example.tran: 柏柏尔小地毯可以当色彩艳丽的壁毯。

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a Caucasoid Muslim people of northern Africa
2. an ethnic minority descended from Berbers and Arabs and living in northern Africa
3. a cluster of related dialects that were once the major language of northern Africa west of Egypt; now spoken mostly in Morocco
